pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis and Visualization of Circular Data // Tools for analyzing and visualizing circular data, including scoring functions for relevant instruments and a generalization of the bootstrapped structural summary method from Zimmermann Wright (2017) doi:10.1177/1073191115621795 and functions for creating publication-ready tables and figures from the results. Future versions will include tools for circular fit and reliability analyses, as well as visualization enhancements.
